thread.title: SweetFrog Introduces Soft Serve Fruit
thread.title_full: SweetFrog Introduces Soft Serve Fruit - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: SweetFrog Introduces Soft Serve Fruit
text:
Chain's selection of healthy frozen treats just got healthier.
Richmond, VA (PRWEB) October 19, 2015
sweetFrog’s selection of healthy frozen treats just got healthier. sweetFrog Enterprises is thrilled to introduce its new Frozen Soft Serve Fruit from Chloe’s Soft Serve Fruit Co. sweetFrog locations will soon rotate a selection of 14 varieties of this new Soft Serve Fruit - providing sweetFrog fans with a fruit-forward option for their frozen treat craving. It can be enjoyed alone, swirled with two fruit options, or paired with other featured frozen yogurt flavors.
“We are excited to offer an even healthier alternative to our frozen yogurt,” said Matt Smith, sweetFrog’s Chief Marketing Officer. “Customers visiting sweetFrog stores will love the intense rich flavor and creamy consistency of our new Frozen Soft Serve Fruit. With this exciting new offering, you can enjoy all of the health benefits and essential nutrients of the fruit, without the guilt!”
At less than 90 calories in a 3.5 oz cup and totally fat free, Chloe’s Soft Serve Fruit is a healthy alternative to other higher calorie desserts. sweetFrog’s new soft serve fruit satiates the frozen treat craving using simple clean ingredients made with only real fruit, filtered water and a touch of organic cane sugar. It has no dairy, gluten or any of the eight major allergens. It is free of preservatives, additives, high fructose corn syrup and stabilizers. sweetFrog’s new product is fat free and is certified kosher pareve and vegan.
"We are thrilled to partner with an iconic franchise such as Sweet Frog and support their effort to offer cleaner options to their customers," said Chloe Epstein, president and co-founder of Chloe’s Soft Serve Fruit Co.
About sweetFrog
sweetFrog ( http://www.sweetfrog.com ) is the fastest growing premium, all natural, self-serve frozen yogurt restaurant company in the country. Sweet Frog currently has 358 stores including company-owned, franchise and independently licensed locations either open or under contract in 27 states in the U.S., Dominican Republic, United Kingdom and Egypt. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Richmond, Virginia. Sweet Frog prides itself on providing a family-friendly environment where customers can enjoy soft-serve frozen yogurt, gelato and sorbets with premium toppings of their choice. The company was founded on Christian principles and seeks to bring happiness and a positive attitude into the lives of the communities it calls home. A listing of stores featuring Soft Serve Fruit can be found at http://www.sweetfrog.com/yogurt/ssfruit .
About Chloe’s Soft Serve Fruit Co.
Chloe’s Soft Serve Fruit Co celebrates the wonder of fruit: its rich flavor, luxurious mouth feel, and natural origin. Available in the traditional soft serve format or as a frozen pop, Chloe’s Soft Serve Fruit answers the consumer desire for great taste and clean, simple ingredients. With 14 varieties of soft serve fruit mix and eight varieties of pops from which to choose, Chloe’s Soft Serve Fruit offers big, delicious flavor using only fruit, water and a touch of organic cane sugar. Chloe’s Soft Serve Fruit is free of dairy, gluten, fat, and the eight major allergens, and is vegan and kosher pareve. Founded by a trio of health-conscious entrepreneurs in 2010, the company has grown from its brick-and-mortar shop in NYC to national distribution for food service with its soft serve fruit mix and single serve pops. In 2015, Chloe’s introduced multi-packs of Chloe's Pops in supermarkets and club stores throughout the country. For more information, visit: http://www.chloesfruit.com .
